member.name: T:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.FindDeadCodeCommand
member.summary: Detect dead (unused) code by comparing function definitions to call sites.

example.code:
# Find dead code in Python files Find-DeadCode -Path "src/**/*.py" -Recurse
# Find dead code without filtering Find-DeadCode -Path "*.js" -ExcludeDecorated:$false -ExcludeEntryPoints:$false
# Specify language explicitly Find-DeadCode -Path "lib/*.ts" -Language typescript

member.name: P:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.FindDeadCodeCommand.Path
member.summary: Path or wildcard pattern for source files (e.g., '*.py', 'src/**/*.js').

member.name: P:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.FindDeadCodeCommand.Language
member.summary: Language name (e.g., 'javascript', 'python'). Optional - auto-detected from file extension if not specified.

member.name: P:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.FindDeadCodeCommand.Recurse
member.summary: Recursively search subdirectories for files.

member.name: P:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.FindDeadCodeCommand.ExcludeDecorated
member.summary: Skip decorated functions (default: true). Decorated functions are often registered via frameworks.

member.name: P:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.FindDeadCodeCommand.ExcludeEntryPoints
member.summary: Skip entry points like main, test_*, etc. (default: true).

member.name: P:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.FindDeadCodeCommand.ExcludeFrameworkHooks
member.summary: Skip framework hooks like __init__, Dispose, etc. (default: true).

member.name: P:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.FindDeadCodeCommand.SchemaPath
member.summary: Optional schema path (defaults to SchemaCache).

member.name: P:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.FindDeadCodeCommand.IncludeStats
member.summary: Include summary statistics in output.

member.name: M:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.FindDeadCodeCommand.GetParser(System.String)
member.summary: Get or create parser for a language.

member.name: M:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.FindDeadCodeCommand.ResolveFiles(System.String)
member.summary: Resolve wildcard pattern to file list.

member.name: M:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.FindDeadCodeCommand.DetectLanguage(System.String)
member.summary: Detect language from file extension.

member.name: T:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.ConvertToLoraxASTCommand
member.summary: Parse code to AST in one-shot mode (no session). Supports wildcard file patterns and auto-detection of language from file extension.

example.code:
# Parse all Python files in current directory ConvertTo-LoraxAST *.py
# Parse all supported files recursively with full AST depth ConvertTo-LoraxAST -Recurse -Depth
# Parse specific file (language auto-detected) ConvertTo-LoraxAST -FilePath app.js
# Parse code string (language required) "def foo(): pass" | ConvertTo-LoraxAST -Language python

member.name: P:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.ConvertToLoraxASTCommand.Code
member.summary: Source code to parse. Requires -Language parameter.

member.name: P:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.ConvertToLoraxASTCommand.FilePath
member.summary: Path or wildcard pattern for source files (e.g., '*.py', 'src/**/*.js'). Defaults to all supported extensions if not specified.

member.name: P:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.ConvertToLoraxASTCommand.Language
member.summary: Language name (e.g., 'javascript', 'python'). Optional for file parsing - auto-detected from extension. Required for code string parsing.

member.name: P:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.ConvertToLoraxASTCommand.Recurse
member.summary: Recursively search subdirectories for files.

member.name: P:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.ConvertToLoraxASTCommand.Depth
member.summary: Extract all child nodes from AST (full depth traversal).

member.name: P:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.ConvertToLoraxASTCommand.SchemaPath
member.summary: Optional schema path (defaults to SchemaCache).

member.name: M:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.ConvertToLoraxASTCommand.GetDefaultPattern
member.summary: Build default wildcard pattern from all supported extensions.

member.name: M:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.ConvertToLoraxASTCommand.GetParser(System.String)
member.summary: Get or create parser for a language.

member.name: M:LoraxMod.Cmdlets.ConvertToLoraxASTCommand.ResolveFiles(System.String)
member.summary: Resolve wildcard pattern to file list.

member.name: T:LoraxMod.ModuleInitializer
member.summary:
Module initializer to configure native library resolution for tree-sitter DLLs.
Solves: When LoraxMod.dll is loaded from external path (e.g., via PWSH_MCP_MODULES), .NET's default resolver doesn't search the module directory for P/Invoke dependencies. This causes all tree-sitter language DLLs to fail loading.
Solution: Register custom resolver that searches runtimes/{RID}/native/ and bin/ directories.

member.name: T:LoraxMod.TreeSitterNode
member.summary: Adapter to wrap TreeSitter.DotNet nodes as INodeInterface.

member.summary: Language ID mapping: User-friendly name -> TreeSitter.DotNet name. TreeSitter.DotNet uses hyphens (c-sharp) but users expect no hyphens (csharp).

member.name: T:LoraxMod.SchemaCache
member.summary:
Schema cache for fetching and caching grammar files from GitHub.
Fetches node-types.json and grammar.json from tree-sitter grammar repositories using the exact revisions specified in tree-sitter-language-pack's language_definitions.json.
Cache is invalidated when loraxmod version changes.

member.name: M:LoraxMod.SchemaCache.GetCacheDir
member.summary: Get versioned cache directory.

member.name: M:LoraxMod.SchemaCache.FetchUrlAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Fetch URL content.

member.name: M:LoraxMod.SchemaCache.GetLanguageDefinitionsAsync
member.summary: Get language definitions (repo URLs and revisions). Cached after first fetch.

member.name: M:LoraxMod.SchemaCache.BuildFileUrl(System.Text.Json.JsonElement,System.String)
member.summary: Build raw GitHub URL for a file in src/.

member.name: M:LoraxMod.SchemaCache.FetchAndCacheAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Fetch a file from GitHub and cache it.

member.name: M:LoraxMod.SchemaCache.GetSchemaPathAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Get path to cached node-types.json for a language. Fetches from GitHub if not cached.

member.name: M:LoraxMod.SchemaCache.GetGrammarPathAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Get path to cached grammar.json for a language. Fetches from GitHub if not cached.

member.summary: Clear all cached schemas.

member.summary: List languages with cached schemas.

member.summary: Get list of all available languages.
